NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
January 2k, 195>8
Dr. Sam Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
I found my copy of your letter to Burt when I got back, and wanted to
waste no time in commenting.
Unfortunately requests for funds to foundations can*t wait. We met
earlier this week to go over my long draft. I*m now redrafting, and
expect to have a revision, for discussion, not later than Tuesday,
since I leave again Wednesday a.m.
Therefore, though it was for Foundation Committee only, I*m attaching
sections of this original draft. Please call Monday with ary sugges¬
tions you have. 1*11 make all changes possible. The next version
will be briefer.
I*m asking our secretary, Judith Gans, to engage in a search of our
files to see if any other research grants-in-aid report copies are
available. I agree that you should have.
Regarding funds for travel, these are all committed except for possi¬
ble balances from the Research Seminar and/or Grants-in-Aid. We
should know about that before too long.
In haste,
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director

cc: Burton Paulu
